typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token"

arguments.value: ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct BadgeTokenFactory.BadgeToken storage ref[] storage ref

devdoc.author: Geoffrey Garcia
devdoc.details: The BadgeTokenFactory contract provides basic structures, functions & modifiers that allows to manage BadgeToken as ERC721 token.

BadgeTokenReady(address,uint256).details: Event emitted when a BadgeToken is ready to be minted.

params._badgeDefinitionId: The ID of BadgeDefinition associated to this BadgeToken.
params._caller: The Ethereum address which has requested for the right to mint the token.

NewBadgeToken(uint256,address).details: Event emitted after a BadgeToken minting.

params._originalOwner: The Ethereum address of the user that has minted the token.

QueryRequest(bytes32,string,string,strin.details: Event emitted to request for a query to be run for BadgeToken minting.

params._indexer: The service indexing the data (possible values: "thegraph, "covalent").
params._protocol: The set/subgraph on the indexer to use (possible values: "uniswap", "compound" ,"aave" ,"ethereum").

QueryResultReceived(bytes32,string).details: Event emitted fter the query and its result have been record into the blockchain for BadgeToken minting.

params._badgeDefinitionFactoryAddress: The Ethereum address of the BadgeDefinitionFactory contract allowing to manage BadgeDefinition.

doesOwnBadgeFromGivenDefinition(address,.details: Check if the conditions to mint the badge are met.

params._owner: The Ethereum address of the user.

params._badgeDefinitionId: The ID of BadgeDefinition associated to this BadgeToken.

returns._badgeTokenId: The ID of the new BadgeToken.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._badgeDefinitionId: The ID of BadgeDefinition associated to this BadgeToken.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `tokenId` token.

returns._0: The result URI associated to the token.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBadgeTokenMinting(bytes32,string).details: Store the result of the query then ask for the Oracle to write it into the blockchain.

devdoc.title: BadgeTokenFactory

BadgeTokenReady(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a BadgeToken is ready to be minted.

NewBadgeToken(uint256,address).notice: Event emitted after a BadgeToken minting.

QueryRequest(bytes32,string,string,strin.notice: Event emitted to request for a query to be run.

QueryResultReceived(bytes32,string).notice: Event emitted after the query and its result have been record into the blockchain.

doesOwnBadgeFromGivenDefinition(address,.notice: Function to test if the badge produced using a BadgeDefinition can be mint.

mintBadgeToken(uint256).notice: Function to mint a BadgeToken as ERC721 tokens.

requestBadgeTokenMinting(uint256).notice: Function to mint a BadgeToken as ERC721 tokens.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Function to get the URI associated to a token.

updateBadgeTokenMinting(bytes32,string).notice: Function to get the result of a query.

userdoc.notice: Contract to use to mint and to transfer (if applicable based on associated BadgeDefinition) BadgeToken that are ERC721 tokens.
